page.title: 06Village High Street
page.content: There is only one street through the village and it is called the High street.I counted the traffic for ten minutes in the morning.There were only 8 vehicles using it.It is mainly a road for pedestrians. The busiest time for the village street is just before school starts and when school finishes.The school bus comes,parents bring children in cars and children are walking in the street.After school and in the holidays,lots of children play in the street and ride their bikes there.I go on the street after teatime.Boys come and play football in a nearby field.Girls ride bikes,play ball and chat together.Grown ups visit each other's houses and walk to the pubs or village hall.At milking time the cows walk from the fields to the farm through the High street.
